import React from 'react' import PropTypes from "prop-types" import "./curso.css" export default function Curso({title, imageSource,text,url, description}) { return (

{title}

{ text ? text:' Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit himenaeos netus.' }

Comprar
) } Curso.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, url: PropTypes.string, imageSource:PropTypes.string, text: PropTypes.string }
